item.title: Saeculum
item.description: Saeculum is first person narrative game designed for a full semester college course. The game is divided in four parts or “arcs” each depicting a specific era of Rome’s history. Students play as one of the ancestors of the Fulvii family through these different ages where they must help fellow politicians and clients the problems that plague Rome in that particular era. In Arc 1, Rome is in the midst of the 2nd Punic War where Hannibal ravages the country side, and students must help Scipio Africanus to convince the senator to take the fight back to Carthage.
